website_summaries.verdict: The music is fun, but add dancing and your kids will be entertained and want to try out their own moves.
pros: Light touch starts the singing and dancing
Comes with 3 modes, including a 'try me' that needs to be turned off at opening
cons: Doesn't respond to voice commands as advertised

website_summaries.verdict: A sweet toy that will be appreciated by toddlers or Baby Shark fans of all ages.
pros: Soft Baby Shark doll that's inspired by the popular children's song
Dances and sings when touched on the head
Also plays songs when fins are pressed
Kids love to sing along with it
cons: Some Baby Sharks quit working after several weeks or months, while others didn't do all of the actions they were suppose to when they arrived

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: So cute my son loves pinkfong I like that it sings the sea song as well, it reacts to Claps not so much when you say baby shark though. My son loves it and started to dance to the music right away. Very easy to turn on by tapping or or squeezing the fin.
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It plays other songs that my toddler isnt familiar with so he gets frustrated that it takes like 16 clicks to the baby shark song. Thats probably why it doesnt even work anymore. All it says is "pink fong" every time we click it. Havent been able to use it or play with it bc it no longer works. The try me section only plays a snippet of the baby shark dance which makes my toddle frustrated too. Definitely not worth $30 and it didnt last not even 3 months. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: janaan

customer_reviews.title: Second one worked.
customer_reviews.text: The first one literally stopped working within minutes. Messing with it revealed the defect was the battery compartment: it didn't maintain contact with all the batteries, thus robbing the critter of power. We ordered a replacement, and it has worked just fine. I have no idea, of course, if I was just unlucky, or if they have a quality control problem. Once we had a working one, our 2-year old enjoyed it quite a bit. One thing to be aware of, hoever: it doesn't really roll properly on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: David Dressler

customer_reviews.title: Cute just doesn’t  not respond to baby shark as it says it will
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and my child loved it. Sings the complete song and the sound is perfectly clear. Only thing is it doesn’t respond to when you call out baby shark “for a fun reaction “ like it states on the packaging- I must’ve called out a million times in a million different voices . but either way really cute so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark is faulty
customer_reviews.text: For $30, you would think it would spin a lot better. It’s so weak that it barely will go on tile. I’m not sure what house doesn’t have tile anymore. Very disappointing. It just seems very cheaply made. The songs are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two year old for his birthday and he LOVES it. It’s by far his favorite toy. The side button wore out already but if you tap his head he’ll start singing again. The songs will definitely get stuck in your head though! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: This toy is made very well and stands up to rough play
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for my ShihTzu’s 11th Birthday, he is not interested in toys for pups. He gravitates to toys for kids and this toy he loves very much. He plays with it all day until he can’t play anymore. Above is a photo of my Nico after he has played all morning. If you have a pup who only likes kids toys I would recommend it for them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Surace

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son’s Easter basket. He loved it. It has a few different songs and phrases. The whole mic thing doesn’t work. Unless you’re screaming baby shark right into it. It was great for 2 months and then the push button on the fin just stopped working. I would say it’s not worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly like the description! Exavtly what I wanted for my son! Very happy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steph G

customer_reviews.title: What adult doesn’t just LOVE baby shark?
customer_reviews.text: So, got a little irritated with son- and was looking for gift for grand daughter that she would love, and he would not. We actually got about 10 different items that ALL sang baby shark. I was pretty happy with myself. This hands down was both my fav and the baby’s as well. Very cute. I’m not 100% sure he understood the intent but baby girl loves her some baby shark and plays with all of it. In the end that’s the most important. The alphabet bus and cell phone were also big hits.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Cute, my 20 month old likes it
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old loves baby shark so I got this for him for Christmas. He loved it the first few days and doesn’t play with it that often anymore. It has various sayings/songs so you’re not just hearing the baby shark all the time (I think that would drive me nuts). It also has “wheels” so it’ll move around. It’s cute. Even though he doesn’t play with it that much anymore, I think I would still buy it. He still does play with it... just not as often as when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: HUGE HIT
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson goes crazy over this toy. Great sound and it is a heck of a lot of fun. Just as described and a wonderful gift. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Wishing all features worked!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to check out this baby shark toy before I wrapped it for my grandson. I don’t know if I should return it or not because one of the modes does not work. It does sing and dance around, reacts to a clapping sound, reacts to tapping his head but it does not react to calling his name as the instructions say. The baby shark toy is cute but for the price I expect all is features to work. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gayter

customer_reviews.title: Wow as described and soft. Arrived on time too
customer_reviews.text: My daughter 17 months love it. Arrived on time ! It’s everything the described. Soft plush, cute and responds to baby shark and touch on the head and press it the button. Loves how it moves (dance swim around on the floor). You just have to have it on the “on” setting and not the try me setting. It’s also makes a great gift for my friends who also has a 14 month baby. She would love it to like my 17 month.
customer_reviews.author: Pinklinks

customer_reviews.title: Filthy
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in the appearance of this product. It is absolutely filthy and I feel like if I send it back it won’t be here on Christmas for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: My niece is OBSESSED with her birthday present. She has carried this thing around for weeks. She sleeps with it, kisses it and it rarely leaves her side. Great sound quality and very durable for all of it's many tumbles. The only negative - you will go insane and never want to hear the Baby Shark song again, if you are over the age of 10. But kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 22 month old Grandson for Christmas and he and my 3 year old Grandson loved it. It moved around the hardwood floor dancing and singing and it's pretty adorable. Didn't have it at my house long enough for it to become annoying (went home with Mom and Dad :-). I definitely recommend it if your little one is into Baby Shark!
customer_reviews.author: Deni T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with this!! It is exactly as pictured. The songs are loud and clear sounding. This works great on a hard surface floor and spins and moves around perfectly. This keeps my one year old busy And it is easy enough for her to push the button herself. You can turn it off or on on the bottom so it’s not constantly draining the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves everything baby shark and I was very excited to hear something other than the baby shark song! It was fun while it lasted. It held up for about a month before it no longer played the songs. You press the button and it just says pinkfong and shuts off. It will play on the “try me” mode, but that’s not even the whole song. It also wouldn’t roll on the carpet or respond to you saying “baby shark”, it did, however, respond to shrieks/cries lol. Not worth the money. I have the baby shark cube that I got for $7.99 months ago and it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty and didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The top of the box is open, so it can get dirty while still in the box. When the toy arrived, there was a dirty hand print on the top of the fabric. It looked like someone had grabbed it, probably when packing it. Plus, pushing down on the top didn't turn it on. Squeezing the flipper made the music play, but there was no "dancing" or motion at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Not just baby shark
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a reward for my students. They LOVE baby shark and got this to motivate them during class instruction. My biggest complaint is that it plays other songs and words other than the baby shark song. It’s difficult when my students want to hear that song and I have to try and click it multiple times to get it to play. I also wish it was a bit louder.
customer_reviews.author: curiocity

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth getting!
customer_reviews.text: Material is nice and plush. Plays multiple songs it says it’s voice activated and clapping activated but it doesn’t work for me..maybe I’m not doing it right. But I could care less for this feature my son is 3 yo and he can handle turning it on off himself and also knows how to push the button on fin and tap it’s head. Great investment if your kid loves baby shark. It’s fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cmtz

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries, dosent work properly
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this baby shark toy ! But i have to say im not 100% happy. Aside from coming with dead batteries. The baby shark dosent respond when you call out its name like mentioned. Also the "clapping feature" works when it wants. The toy is on the quieter side which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Cartiglia

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lickin and keeps on tickin
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson’s nicknames are Bam Bam and Sour Patch Kid for a great reason. He’s your typical 2 year old. This poor little shark has been tossed, tackled, banged, kicked and God knows what else a rambunctious 2 year old could do to it. Definitely worth the cost and a great buy he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette T.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my daughter and I must say, and k say this with plenty of angst, it works as advertised, I want nothing more than to kidnap this thing in the dead of night and bury it in 3 towns over. She loves it. It sings and dances. If they love that ear poison of a song they will love this
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My nephew, like so many, is a huge fan of Baby Shark and he absolutely loves this. Worth every penny. High quality and has continued to work great despite the rough playtimes it's been through. It's made really well and will make any kid who likes baby shark very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter who just turned 1 and I’m very happy with it. I like that it plays the entire original baby shark song along with other songs and phrases. The words and music are perfectly clear and it moves to everything. I’m sure my granddaughter will love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kozloski

customer_reviews.title: Adorable baby shark toy
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this baby shark toy! It sings and dances around. It's so cute! The packaging was kinda messed up but it probably got bent around during delivery. I recommend this to anyone interested in baby shark items. This will keep your little ones entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia G.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter that is turning 2 and I was super excited to see it in action. I opened it at the office and have several co-workers coming and watching it. It moves around on the floor well and the sound was great. The adults have been entertained and I know it will more than entertain my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hansen

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old loves baby shark
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves his baby shark. He actually picks up baby shark and hugs him. I thought it would be too bulky and heavy for him but it is actually fairly soft. More songs than baby shark so that is nice. I will say I turn off baby shark when vacuuming and other loud activities as baby shark is noise activated
customer_reviews.author: Heather McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Pinkfong...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out the box. Toddler doesn't care for the other songs they put aside from baby shark and every time a song plays now it gets cut off with pinkfong and stops. Hasn't even been a full month. Waiting to see if the replacement is any better
customer_reviews.author: Mari3

customer_reviews.title: Does not respond to Baby Shark command
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift for a toddler who loves baby shark. What sold me is that its supposed to respond to the the phrase "Baby Shark". I should have gone with the majority of the reviews where there were multiple complaints for that 1 issue. Without that feature, there's no way this item is worth $30. I will be returning my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up ~
customer_reviews.text: The color is bright and appealing. Made extremely well. It's well-worth $29.99. My two-year granddaughter loves Baby Shark. She smiles, laughs, dances, clapped her hands and before I knew it we joined in and had lots of fun. Baby Shark is a staple now. Recommended. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This product was cute and worked properly when I first got it. Then the baby’s interest left and it sat in her toy box for a month or 2. Now she is crazy about Baby Shark and the unit doesn’t work. Every now and again it will talk or sing but the button doesn’t work, the shark doesn’t move and it doesn’t respond to clapping.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzy Voe

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my son's favorite toys. The sound is plenty loud unlike some of the other baby shark stuffed animals we have bought. It plays the whole Baby Shark song and two other catchy sea songs. It dances well on hard floors. Doesn't move on the carpet. I can't get it to respond when I say or yell "baby shark" but it does turn on at some loud noises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is the cutest baby shark toy ever! I was surprised the quality of it the sound is excellent and the shark is very sturdy and soft. My daughter who loves this song on little baby bum. She’s only nine months but she stops everything she’s doing when she hears this song. The shark is 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 1 & 1/2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is literally obsessed with this thing! My sister has sent me multiple videos of him playing with it. He carries it around with every where! Lol! She does say she hears the baby shark song in her sleep pretty much now, so make this a gift ;)
customer_reviews.author: kelsea.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved the Dancing Baby Shark Stuffed Toy
customer_reviews.text: What a cute toy. Hope you don't get this song in your head. Ha, ha!. My Grandson, who is 18 months old really enjoyed and interacted with the dancing Baby Shark. It was a little awkward to wrap but all in all a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bonyea

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved it! Sings and dances...He’s obsessed with baby shark I was going to give it him for Christmas but I was to excited I decided to give it to him on Wednesday when it arrived worked perfectly fine but it’s Saturday it stop working out of no where let than a week we even changed the batteries and nothing so disappointed thankfully amazon is awesome and replacing it
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez moran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter got this doll for Christmas. It plays her favorite song and asks her to dance with it, which she loves to do. My husband's favorite part of the doll is it's off switch. lol When we get tired of hearing the song we tell her it was time for baby shark's nap and turn it off. She accepts it well and plays with something else. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Moss

customer_reviews.title: So cute swimming around and singing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read anything before buying ....my son's obsessed with baby shark so I was like a shark that sings.... he will love it but.... it sings AND DANCES!!!! Past worth it!!!! Best baby shark product by far!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Jackson family

customer_reviews.title: Plays many songs and very interactive
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it as does my son. Although it is a stuffed animal that moves I’d actually prefer it to be just a stuffed animal as my son is 13months and prefers to hold things instead of watch it move and dance with it. It’s better for a bit older kids in my opinion but every child is different
customer_reviews.author: lance r

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Only 1 defect.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. I love that it plays the whole baby shark song. The other songs are nice too. As others have said, it doesn’t respond to “baby shark” like it states though which is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Swan

customer_reviews.title: Song is clear and baby shark moves great!
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loves baby shark and loves this thing. It does move well when it's on on surfaces that are not carpeted. You can turn it off :) It's got some good weight to it and he likes carrying it around when it's not on. Keeps my kiddo's attention.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo I. Silva

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for the Baby Shark Lovers (even parents)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son and I'll be honest. I thought I was going to torture myself with this. BUT I DIDN'T!!!! It plays more than just Baby Shark, it plays other Pink Fong songs which is nice for a break from Baby Shark. It is super cute and we all love playing with it (YES EVEN MYSELF!!!!).
customer_reviews.author: Keri Lamagna Lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Cutest! I bought one for my 1yo niece and my 8mo. Love how it dances on the floor. I bought it on black Friday for less, not sure I could justify the $29 or whatever they're selling for regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Fun for little ones!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for My little 2 year old grand baby. He had it figured out in a few seconds. Plays the whole baby shark song and two others and talks and dances. the price was very reasonably for the value. I'm going to buy one for my grand daughter when she turns two in September.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi P.

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My little nephew love the toy. He would just sit there for hours watching it dancing and singing the song. I’m glad that I am not in the same house as him because it becomes really annoying after one hour. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Product delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. The delivery person threw the box against my door with a lot of force. I tried to catch the driver, but she had already fled my side of the building. I wish the drivers for Amazon were vetted with more accuracy...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C. Cichocki

customer_reviews.title: Very good for children
customer_reviews.text: Only one thing doesn't work. When you said baby shark, even on top of your lung. It doesn't do anything like it said in the instruction paper. But my niece loves it and she can't stop singing and dancing with it
customer_reviews.author: yuyu

customer_reviews.title: Could be a bad one received or just not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandbaby and worked well for a couple of weeks. The song would half play and the toy would sporadically stop moving. Changed batteries and it still will not work right. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: My baby lives it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year-old for Christmas. He absolutely loves it! He loves dancing around with it while it seems the baby shark song. I still think $30 is a little expensive for this toy but to see my baby happy it was completely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Leonard

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for Christmas ( he was 9 months at the time) he loves it! Everyone loves it!! Although good luck getting the baby shark song out of your head. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved this! It was one of her Christmas gifts and she still plays with this everyday! If you kid likes baby shark, this is the perfect gift. Just beware, the song is stuck in your head all day. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but doesn’t work like it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! My son loves it. However, it says on the user manual that you can say ‘baby shark’ or clap to get the shark to move, but I’ve tried both and it doesn’t work, just sits there.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Watson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute..it moves and sings. My granddaughter loves it and chases the toy and runs from it when it comes near her. I have some treasured pictures at Christmas. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves her baby shark! She received several birthday gifts but this one was the BIG HIT of the day! There are 3-4 songs and two different greetings.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it, except it stopped working. We got it for her for Christmas, and before January was even up it ONLY says “Pink Fong” now (no songs), it does not spin or move around anymore, and it never responded to voice or clapping. Very disappointing and not worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: bradford haberlin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and I was not impressed. The toy was in tact and looks presentable but it began malfunctioning the second I flipped the on switch. Unfortunately we ripped the tags off before making sure it worked, so that was our fault but I was upset that my daughter doesn't get to enjoy this toy. It sits at the bottom of the toy box.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnie Rios

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is 1 loved this! It would dance, she would dance. Just the cutest thing ever. If your child or grandchild is a baby shark fan, they will love this
customer_reviews.author: may77

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if it responded to us calling "baby shark" as promised but unfortunately it doesn't respond to that. It does respond to clapping and it does sing the whole song and my two year old niece is in love with it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Interactive Baby Doo Doo Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son who loves "baby doo doo," and gets crazy excited every time he sees anything Baby Shark related. It's much bigger than we were expecting and the way it glides along the floor is pretty neat. Our son loves it and it. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Briley Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for children and adults
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to an adult friend who loves the baby shark song. She loved it! I wish the volume was a little higher but given it's for small children I can't really complain. Figuring out the instructions might take a few minutes for an adult. Entertaining if you love the Baby Shark song. I would buy it for a small child and adult fans with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ather

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shark. Exactly as ordered. I gave presentation a 4 because the shark was slightly dirty on the bottom when it arrived. But this toy was VERY well loved by my granddaughter!! The shark plays the entire song.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this dancing baby shark! And I love that it plays 3 different songs and had a few phrase as well. It helps keep me sane! 🙃 the other songs are super cute as well. My older daughter loves singing the under the sea song.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Sings/ says a bunch of different stuff.. including the FULL baby shark song. Super cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara lopez

customer_reviews.title: Dances around the room
customer_reviews.text: This little shark sings adorable songs while dancing around the room on tiny wheels. I purchased it for my nephew and it's his favorite toy! He chase's it for hours
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A very happy child for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: All I know is that it dances, sings, talks, and my grand niece absolutely loves it. She so happy, I can’t describe it. I have no complaints and am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Chas Lokich

customer_reviews.title: Nephew’s favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1.5 year old nephew’s favorite toy! It flies all over their hard-wood floors. He’s has thrown this thing around so much and cannot break it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive Fish
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old niece loved this. She was so infatuated with it we played it over and over. The clapping worked as it says and it moves around so cute. I love the little sea song it’s plays about the sea animals. Would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS EVERYTIME
customer_reviews.text: Literally box after a month reordered another and that broke after a month too so I reordered another because my son loves it and that BROKE TOO. And they all broke the same way. Won’t play pass “baby shark” song once it gets to the mama shark part and goes straight to like its being turned on again saying “pinkfong”
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Martin

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great $30 distraction... Which... let's be honest, is exactly why everybody's buying this. Plays the full baby shark song when you push the head and dances around. You will not regret buying this. If your child has a fear of Roombas they may be a little afraid of it at first because of its sporadic movements.
customer_reviews.author: Bankai78

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Four month old loves this stupid song and so had to get this. It’s adorable. Doesn’t do great on carpet though. Not too loud which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the baby shark song. This is one of her favorite toys now. I like the other song that it plays. It does play the full baby shark song as long as you have it on the right setting.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli Berry

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark Doo Doo Doo!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! I saw a friend purchase for her child. I immediately went home and ordered it. The only negative is that he doesn’t have a volume switch. It’s loud!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My little ones favorite toy! Definitely worth the purchase. I will say the volume occasionally sounds low. Not sure if it’s a malfunction but overall Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for baby shark fans
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves this. He got it for Christmas and he opened the wrapping paper and was so excited we had a hard time getting it out of the box for him. It is cute and you can turn it off when he isn’t playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gillispietym,hr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Oh baby shark is so cute. He not only sings but dances all’s well. The song is the original baby shark song which is awesome. This is a perfect gift for little ones. Providing hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love that shark!!!! And so does the baby!!! 😆
customer_reviews.text: The baby shark was a birthday gift for my friend's 1 yr old daughter. She says that she absolutely loves it and is learning how to walk because she's always chasing after it. I'm also a little ashamed to say that I almost got her another gift because I fell in love with it myself. Lol!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thai78

customer_reviews.title: Sings more than one song!  Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. He dances and “swims” and sings more than just baby shark!
customer_reviews.author: J. H Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dance
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3 year old grandson , it’s suppose to dance, the wheels turn around but it does not dance , disappointing purchasee
customer_reviews.author: Brooksie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy to keep the baby entertained  for hours
customer_reviews.text: Biught for my best friends baby's first birthday that was Baby Shark themed. He loves playing qith it and keeps him entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie D.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and good quality. It was a gift and the little boy loved it, specially when it started to sing and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Cuca

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive as far as toddler gifts go, but she loves it and it works well. No problems so far, and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 2yr old and he loves it and dances around with it. It sings the "baby shark" line and the "let's go hunt" line. It does not play the entire song.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark, 21st century pacifier
customer_reviews.text: Well, like this song or hate it, almost every kid on the planet has heard and probably enjoyed the baby shark song/video. Babies will stop crying when they hear the tune even if they are bloody throwing a fit.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for any little one that likes Baby Shark. Plays more than one song.m and very entertaining for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! This was the perfect gift for my 18 month old grandbaby!!!! She still loves it 3 months after Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: SabrinaSings

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I loved this gift! Worth every penny! I was surprised that it played two other full songs in addition to the baby shark song! My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loves this toy! I got more than what I bargained for! It dances around which I didn't know. Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris88

customer_reviews.title: It sings at random times if left on
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for the first few days, but if you don’t turn it off it starts to sing at random times. After it sang at 2am in the toy box, she got scared of it so I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Markell

customer_reviews.title: One of the better singing toys we've gotten
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Doesn't respond to voice but does seem to play when someone walks by heavily in addition to pressing the fin. Not too loud, a couple of good songs included and a small circle of motion.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Was well enjoyed!  Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable. Our one year old love it! It has 2 different settings you can choose from. It spins and dances around as it sings different songs. Great hit!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The toy was okay for the price. The little ones like to dance with it but it does not move around as much as expected.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: My three and five year old love this funny toy. I’d rather it played the whole song each time it’s pushed as it says other shorter things and it needs pushed frequently. Really cute and good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea melsha

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids like the shark. It worked for about 30mins. It died out. I thought it was the batteries. Batteries were replaced and it still doesn’t work. It was a gift for my grand kids which I gave them when I saw them weeks after I purchased it. They were disappointed. I can’t even replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Ani Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Nephew
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to one of my nephews for Christmas and as soon as he saw it rotate by itself while singing the famous catchy baby shark song he got so exited.Another thing I liked about it was that it had battery’s included.There was no need to take it off the package ,I simply rapped it and left under the tree for the special day.If you want to make a little pink fog fan’s day,I totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HappyUncle

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 21 month old loves his shark and dances to the main tune constantly. Also makes adults dance with him. Favorite toy received on the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: DEL

customer_reviews.title: Just Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 3 of these for the little ones in my family. And now I'm the favorite aunt! They are super cute and moves around while playing Baby Shark and other songs, and the kids clap, sing, and we have giggles galore!
customer_reviews.author: Shan64

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy purchase out of ALL the toys my son owns. This makes him giggle, dance, get excited and play. He LOVES baby shark. Generally he holds it and plays with it but it does run around on the floor too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Norman

product_meta.title: WowWee Pinkfong Baby Shark Official Dancing Doll
product_meta.description: Style:Standard| Design:SingleMove to the music with this fun and dynamic baby shark dancing doll! Watch it dance to the baby shark song, the global sensation with over 3. 3 billion views! Tap his head or clap for it to move and make sounds! Call his name "baby shark" For fun reactions! There are so many ways to play!
feature_bullets: Produced by WowWee for Pinkfong, official creator of the global hit song Baby Shark!
Tap the top of Baby Shark’s head for him to dance and sing to the Baby Shark song (English version)!
Call his name "Baby Shark" for fun reactions!
Press Baby Shark’s fin to hear 2 bonus songs!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,074 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
